---- OVERVIEW ----

Andaman has immense possibilities of romance for romantic couples. It has amazing and exuberant natural beauty and secluded beaches attract couples and honeymooners. It has wide expansive beaches to spend some quality time with your loved ones and get rejuvenated. It has dense deep forests and enigmatic wild life that takes you through primitive lands for those who are keen to enjoy the beauty of strange lands with the newly formed love relation. The serenity and the moments of privacy that couples can enjoy make romantic couples choose this destination.
Avail the Romantic Getaway package to have some serene moments of unforgettable memory. Discover the joys of this strangely beautiful island group.
Main Highlights of this Tour:
* Charm of Port Blair unfolds
* Ross Island sojourn
* Coral/North Bay Island adventure
* Exquisite Viper Island
* Port Blair to Havelock Island
* Excursion to Kala Pathar Beach
* Serene Vijayanagar Beach
* Full day excursion to Elephant Beach with 1 session of Snorkelling
* Radha Nagar Beach
* Ferry cruise from Port Blair to Havelock and back
* Departure
---- SHORT ITINERARY ----
Day 1: Arrival at Port Blair + Ross Island /Coral/North Bay Island & Viper Island
Day 2: Port Blair to Havelock Island
Day 3: Excursion to Kala Pathar beach excursion & Vijaynagar beach
Day 4: Full day excursion to Elephant Beach with 1 session of snorkelling
Day 5: Radha Nagar beach/Havelock to Port Blair
Day 6: Departure
---- DETAILED ITINERARY ----
Day 1: Arrival at Port Blair + Ross Island/Coral/North Bay Island & Viper Island

The first day begins with landing at Port Blair Veer Savarkar International Airport. The representative of AndamanTourism will meet and greet you at the airport and drop you to the assigned hotel in Port Blair. After settling at the hotel room, move towards the Phoenix Bay Jetty for a short trip to Ross Island. Ross Island is an interesting destination with historical remains of the British colonial era and reveals how luxuriously the rulers lived and what a painful life is led by the Indians, especially the political prisoners. After Ross Island proceed to Coral/North Bay Island to have a gala playful time in water among various sports and activities. Later visit Viper Island to have more glimpses of colonial rule. This island is known as the island of snakes too and you might spot one or two in the island. After a long and happening day return to Port Blair hotel to catch up with rest and sleep.
Day 2: Port Blair to Havelock Island

Day 2 starts with a drop at Phoenix Bat Jetty for an onward journey to Havelock. The high-speed catamaran provides a pleasant ride across the Andaman seas to reach the beautiful Havelock Island. Rest of the day is at leisure in Havelock. You may explore the property or stroll along the nearby beaches and take in the sand and sea as much as possible. Overnight stay at Havelock in serene surroundings.
Day 3: Excursion to Kala Pathar Beach excursion & Vijaynagar Beach

After an early breakfast, drive to Kalapatthar Beach. This beach derives its name from the submerged black rocks (kala means black and patthar means rocks). Thus you won’t be able to indulge in joyful swimming or other water activities in this beach. The drive to the beach is extremely picturesque. Enjoy the tropical fragrance in the air. It is a secluded beach where you can spend some exclusive moments with your loved ones. In the second half, proceed towards the very beautiful Vijayanagar Beach for a grand feast to the eyes. It is one of the finest beaches of Andamans. Its beauty and serenity is unmatched. You can laze around in the beach, build sandcastles, play infinite in the warm waters. After a fun-filled day return to the hotel in Havelock to spend the night.
Day 4: Full day excursion to Elephant Beach with 1 session of Snorkelling

After breakfast, proceed towards the Elephant Beach, which is famous for scuba diving and snorkelling. Take a splendid snorkelling session of the underwater world under the supervision of experts. Go for scuba or sea-walking, avail the glass-bottom boat ride. The waters in Elephant Beach are remarkably transparent offering the best views of the corals underneath. Also, the coral reef here is full of life. This beach is so full of adventure activities, that your day will be spent in the most joyful manner. Return at day end to the hotel at Havelock for night stay.
Day 5: Radha Nagar beach/Havelock to Port Blair

In the second half, proceed towards the very famous Radhanagar Beach for a grand feast to the eyes. It is one of the best beaches of the world. Its beauty and serenity is unmatched and plan to spend some quality time with soul partner. You can laze around in the beach, rest and relax, watch the tiny sea creatures and feel the starfishes getting trapped at times in between the rocks while getting washed onto the beach. After a beauty-driven trip to Radhanagar Beach, return to Port Blair by high-speed catamaran to spend the night at a hotel in Port Blair.
Day 6: Departure
End of vacation means bidding farewell to this land of sea and sand. With heart laden with happy memories and joyous moments depart from Veer Savarkar Airport of Port Blair for your return journey.
